text:
Hi all

We just added our first React App to HubSpot since local dev got available
But the state doesn't seem to update.
When we log the state it shows up in the console, but the app itself isn't showing the updated state. This problem occurs only when the internet connection is a bit slow. Could HubSpot cache be messing with the state and now showing the updated version?
Its a small React app on a HubSpot page
HubSpot caching is on the server side so I don’t think that’s the issue.  How are updating state?  Are you using redux, the defualt `this.setState()`, or something else?
Also, <@UGDF9EBPW> do you have a URL where we could take a look at it?  Generally seeing it usually helps
We are using the default this.setState functionality of React (Preact)
another option would be to call the `hbspt.forms.create` method inside the `onFormSubmit()` callback and just reload the same form over and over.
